VID+F – Your Personal Video Navigator

Ever found yourself scrubbing through a long YouTube video to find that one moment or piece of information you're looking for? With VID+F, you don't have to!


What it does

VID+F revolutionizes the way you consume video content by allowing you to navigate to specific segments of YouTube videos swiftly and efficiently. Simply type in what you're looking for — a phrase, a step in a tutorial, a moment, or a topic — and let the extension find it for you.

Whether it's a quote in a lecture, a highlight in a podcast, or a step in a DIY tutorial, your sought-after moment is just a search away.


Why you should install it

Save Time: No more manual scrubbing through videos. Get to the exact moment you want in a fraction of the time.

Enhanced Learning: Ideal for students and lifelong learners, easily find and revisit crucial points in educational videos.

Personalized Viewing: Tailor your viewing experience by skipping to the segments that interest you the most.

Simple and Intuitive: Easy to install and use, making your YouTube experience smoother and more enjoyable.


Get VID+F Today!

Empower your YouTube watching experience with the power of smart navigation. Make every second of video content count and enhance your learning and entertainment journey with Vid+F.

Install now and take your YouTube experience to the next level!
